title: Navigation Arrows
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps on the navigation arrows in the header
custom_expected: THEN the user can navigate between days

title: Swipe
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user swipes the scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the user can navigate between days

title: Vertical Scroll - Collapsed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
AND the game cells are not expanded
custom_steps: WHEN a user vertically swipes the scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN all the games will scroll up as one view
AND will go under the date and navigation bar

title: Vertical Scroll - Expanded
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
AND the game cells are expanded
custom_steps: WHEN a user vertically swipes the scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN the top game cell will not lock at the top of the Scoreboard
AND the expanded game information will scroll under the date and navigation bar
AND the next game will not lock to the top

title: Scoreboard -> User Can Navigate Back Two Seasons
custom_preconds: * User has Latest Build
custom_steps:
Given the user navigates to the scoreboard screen
When the user attempts to navigate back two seasons
custom_expected:
Then the user will be able to see back two seasons ago
and all appropriate data will be available and actionable

title: User taps on the Date Header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app is installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps on the date in the top of the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the Calendar Picker appears

title: Number of games on Calendar matches number of games in Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the Date at the top of the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN the Calendar picker will appear
AND the number of games listed on each date in the calendar should match the number of games scheduled for that date.

title: User taps on a date in the Calendar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND has launched the calendar picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a date on the calendar picker
custom_expected:
THEN the calendar picker should disappear
AND the user should be taken back to the Scoresboard
AND the date that the user is left on should be the newly selected date

title: User taps on the 'Today' button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
AND the user is on a date that is different than today's date
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the Date in the top of the Scoreboard
AND the user taps the 'Today' button in the top of the calendar picker
custom_expected:
THEN the calendar picker should disappear
AND the user should be brought to the Scoreboard
AND the date the user is on should be 'Todays' date

title: User taps on the forward and back arrows in Calendar Picker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
And has launched the Calendar picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the left or right calendar arrows
custom_expected: THEN the calendar should adjust and show the newly selected month accordingly

title: User swipes left and right in Calendar Picker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND has launched the Calendar picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user swipes left and right on the calendar
custom_expected: THEN the calendar should flip to show the newly selected month

title: User taps month from the month bar at the bottom of Calendar Picker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND has launched the calendar picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a month from the bottom month bar
custom_expected:
THEN the month tapped should show as selected in the bottom bar
and the month selected should be reflected in the calendar

title: Flip Time - Before 10am
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has device set to before 10am
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the previous day default on the Scoreboard

title: Flip Time - After 10am
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has device set to after 10am
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the current day default on the Scoreboard

title: Logos and Names
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user swipes the Scoreboard vertically
custom_expected: THEN all team names and logos appear correctly and up to date

title: Venue Information
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps:
WHEN the user expands the Scoreboard
AND views a game in preview
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the venue information (Stadium Name, City, State)

title: ********* Expand (DEPRECATED/ AUTOMATED) **********
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a game row that is not expanded
custom_expected: THEN all game rows will expand

title: ******** Collapse (DEPRECATED/ AUTOMATED) *******
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a game row that is expanded
custom_expected: THEN all game rows will collapse

title: Highlights
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on Scoreboard
AND the game row is expanded
AND views the drawer of a game that has highlights
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls through the highlights
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a video thumbnail
AND the blurb and duration (MM:SS) will follow the thumbnail

title: No Highlights
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on Scoreboard
AND the game row is expanded
custom_steps: When a user views the drawer of a game that has no highlights
custom_expected: THEN there will be no video tray visible

title: Highlights - Swipe
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on Scoreboard
AND the game row is expanded
AND views the drawer of a game that has highlights
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls through the highlights
custom_expected:
Then the next highlight will be brought into view
AND sticks to the left margin

title: Highlights - Tap area
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on Scoreboard
AND the game row is expanded
AND views the drawer of a game that has highlights
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the thumbnail
OR taps on the blurb and duration
custom_expected: THEN the corresponding highlight will play

title: Highlights - See All
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on Scoreboard
AND the game row is expanded
custom_steps: WHEN a user views the drawer of a game that has more than 5 highlights

custom_steps_separated.content: AND a user swipes through the highlights to the end
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a See All button

custom_steps_separated.content: AND taps on the See All button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be taken to the Videos tab of Gameday for that game
AND the user can view all of the highlights for that game

title: Highlights - Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on Scoreboard
AND the game row is expanded
AND views the drawer of a game that has highlights
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on a Highlight
AND rotates the device
custom_expected:
THEN the highlight play
AND will continue to play when rotate

title: Highlights - Review
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on Scoreboard
AND the game row is expanded(4/9/18: TB/CHW)
AND views the drawer of a game that has highlights
custom_steps:
WHEN the user scrolls through the highlights
AND Highlight is a Review

(highlight must have "value" : "vtp_review" flag in API)
custom_expected: Then the user will see an orange banner with REVIEW in white font

title: Highlights - Statcast
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on Scoreboard
AND the game row is expanded
AND views the drawer of a game that has highlights
custom_steps:
WHEN the user scrolls through the highlights
AND Highlight is a Statcast

(highlight must have "value" : "vtp_player_tracking" flag in API)
custom_expected: Then the user will see an blue banner with STATCAST in white font

title: Linescore - RHE
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on Scoreboard
AND the game row is expanded
AND views the linescore
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the RHE for a game in Live or Final
custom_expected:
THEN the linescore will be displayed with the Runs (R) for both teams being bold
AND the Hits (H) and Errors (E) not bold

title: Linescore - Inning Indicator
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on Scoreboard
AND the game row is expanded
AND views the linescore
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the RHE for a live game

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in top inning
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the inning indicator will be displayed on the top portion of the linescore

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in the bottom inning
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the inning indicator will be displayed on the bottom portion of the linescore

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in the Mid or End inning
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then no inning indicator will be displayed

title: Linescore - Extra Innings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on Scoreboard
AND the game row is expanded
AND views the linescore for a game in extra innings
custom_steps: WHEN a user views the linescore
custom_expected:
THEN the user is able to scroll the linescore
AND can see each of the innings

title: Preview
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND the Scoreboard is expanded
custom_steps: WHEN a user views a game in preview
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a game link for Preview
AND tapping on the link will open the Gameday Preview for that game

title: Tickets
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND the Scoreboard is expanded
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views a game in preview
AND tickets are available
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a game link for Tickets
AND tapping on the link will open the Tickets page in Safariwebviewcontroller

title: In Progress
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND the Scoreboard is expanded
custom_steps: WHEN a user views a game in progress
custom_expected: THEN the user see links for Gameday, Box, Summary, and Videos (if highlights available)

custom_steps_separated.content: AND taps on Gameday
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Gameday Pitch by Pitch view will open for that game

custom_steps_separated.content: AND taps on Box
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Gameday Bod Score will open for that game

custom_steps_separated.content: AND taps on Summary
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Gameday Summary (Scoring Plays and All Plays) will open for that game

title: Final
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND the Scoreboard is expanded
custom_steps: WHEN a user views a game in Final
custom_expected: THEN the user see links for Wrap, Box, Summary, and Videos (if highlights available)

custom_steps_separated.content: AND taps on Wrap
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Gameday Wrap view will open for that game

custom_steps_separated.content: AND taps on Box
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Gameday Bod Score will open for that game

custom_steps_separated.content: AND taps on Summary
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Gameday Summary (Scoring Plays and All Plays) will open for that game

custom_steps_separated.content: AND taps on Videos
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Gameday Videos will open for that game
AND the user can view the MLB.TV feeds and Highlights

title: MLB.TV - Home Feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND the Scoreboard is expanded
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views a game with a MLB.TV feed
and taps the "MLB.TV" link
custom_expected: Then the home team's feed will launch by default

title: MLB.TV - Favorite Team (Home)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a Favorite Team set
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND the Scoreboard is expanded
AND the Favorite team is playing
AND is the home team
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps the "MLB.TV" link
custom_expected: Then the favorite team's feed will launch by default

title: MLB.TV - Favorite Team (Away)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a Favorite Team set
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND the Scoreboard is expanded
AND the Favorite team is playing
AND is the away team
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps the "MLB.TV" link
custom_expected: Then the favorite team's feed will launch by default

title: MLB.TV - Followed Team (Home)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a Followed Team set
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND the Scoreboard is expanded
AND the Followed team is playing
AND is the home team
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps the "MLB.TV" link

(make sure the opposing team is not the user's Favorite Team or a Followed Team ranked higher)
custom_expected: Then the Followed team's feed will launch by default

title: MLB.TV - Followed Team (Away)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a Followed Team set
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND the Scoreboard is expanded
AND the Followed team is playing
AND is the away team
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps the "MLB.TV" link

(make sure the opposing team is not the user's Favorite Team or a Followed Team ranked higher)
custom_expected: Then the Followed team's feed will launch by default

custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND the Scoreboard is expanded
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views a game with a MLB Audio feed
and taps the "Audio" link
custom_expected: Then the home team's feed will launch by default

title: MLB Audio - Favorite Team (Home)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a Favorite Team set
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND the Scoreboard is expanded
AND the Favorite team is playing
AND is the home team
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps the "Audio" link
custom_expected: Then the favorite team's feed will launch by default

title: MLB Audio - Favorite Team (Away)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a Favorite Team set
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND the Scoreboard is expanded
AND the Favorite team is playing
AND is the away team
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps the "Audio" link
custom_expected: Then the favorite team's feed will launch by default

title: MLB Audio - Followed Team (Home)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a Followed Team set
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND the Scoreboard is expanded
AND the Followed team is playing
AND is the home team
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps the "Audio" link

(make sure the opposing team is not the user's Favorite Team or a Followed Team ranked higher)
custom_expected: Then the Followed team's feed will launch by default

title: MLB Audio - Followed Team (Away)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a Followed Team set
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND the Scoreboard is expanded
AND the Followed team is playing
AND is the away team
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps the "Audio" link

(make sure the opposing team is not the user's Favorite Team or a Followed Team ranked higher)
custom_expected: Then the Followed team's feed will launch by default

title: Exhibition Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the day with an exhibition game
custom_expected: Then the game will be displayed on the Scoreboard

title: Non MLB
custom_preconds:
IVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user views a game between MLB and Non MLB club
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the default baseball as the logo for the non MLB club

title: Spring Training Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the the day with an spring training game
custom_expected: Then the game will be displayed on the Scoreboard

title: Split Squad
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views a Spring Training game
AND the game has at least one team is a split squad
custom_expected: THEN the user will see Split Squad Indicator (SS) next to the team name

title: No Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user views a day with no games
custom_expected: THEN the user will see 'No Scheduled Games' text

title: Favorite Team - Indicator
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND has a Favorite Team set
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game of the Favorite Team
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the solid yellow star next to the team name

title: Favorite Team - Sorting
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND has a Favorite Team set
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game of the Favorite Team

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in preview
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game of the Favorite Team before the other games

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game of the Favorite Team before the other games

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in final
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game of the Favorite Team before the other games

title: Followed Team(s) - Indicator
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND has Followed Team(s) set
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game of the Followed Team(s)
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the Followed team(s) with a grey-outlined star next to the team name

title: Followed Team(s) - Sorting
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND has Followed Team(s) set
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game of the Followed Team(s)

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in preview
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the game will be sorted under the Favorite Team
and in the order of how they are listed in the Team Settings

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the game will be sorted under the Favorite Team
and in the order of how they are listed in the Team Settings

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in final
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the game will be sorted under the Favorite Team
and in the order of how they are listed in the Team Settings

title: Records
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for game

custom_steps_separated.content: AND on the previous day
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the team records (W-L) for each team

custom_steps_separated.content: AND on the current day
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the team records (W-L) for each team

custom_steps_separated.content: AND on the next day
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the team records (W-L)  for each team

custom_steps_separated.content: AND on two days or more ahead
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the team records (W-L)  for each team

title: Probable Pitchers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on a game row that is expanded
AND views the game row

custom_steps_separated.content: AND no probable pitchers for either team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see TBD and blank headshot

custom_steps_separated.content: AND probable pitcher for one team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see the probable pitcher, stats (W-L, ERA), and headshot for the appropriate team
AND TBD and blank headshot for the other team

custom_steps_separated.content: AND probable pitcher for both teams
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the probable pitcher, stats (W-L, ERA), and headshot for the both teams

title: MLB.TV Game of the Day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user views a MLB.TV Game of the Day

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in preview
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see "MLB.TV Free Game of the Day" text in separate row above the game row

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see "MLB.TV Free Game of the Day" in separate row above the game row

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in final
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see "MLB.TV Free Game of the Day" text in separate row above the game row

title: Sponsored Game of the Day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user views a sponsored Game of the Day

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in preview
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see sponsored Game of the Day text in separate row above the game row

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see sponsored Game of the Day text in separate row above the game row

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in final
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see sponsored Game of the Day text in separate row above the game row

title: Single Ticket Doubleheader
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views a single ticket double header
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a game time for the first game
AND see Game 2 for the second game

title: Split Ticket Doubleheader
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views a split ticket double header
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a game time for the first game
AND see a game time for the second game

title: Data Updates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views a game row for a game in progress

custom_steps_separated.content: AND a strike occurs in the game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the strike will reflect in the count

Count: Balls - Strike

custom_steps_separated.content: AND a ball occurs in the game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the ball will reflect in the count

Count: Balls - Strike

custom_steps_separated.content: AND a run occurs in the game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the run will reflect in the score for the correct team

custom_steps_separated.content: AND a baserunner occurs in the game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the base runner will reflect on the correct base

title: Logos
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the All Star Game
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the appropriate logo for the National League
AND the appropriate logo for the American League

title: Broadcaster Logos
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views a Postseason game
custom_expected: THEN the user will see broadcaster text or logo

title: Series Status Text
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views a Postseason game
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the series status text

example: World Series Game 2: LAD leads series 1-0

title: Preview - TBD
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game without a time
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a game on the schedule
AND it will have TBD in place of the time

title: Preview - Time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game with a time
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a game on the schedule
AND it will have start time in the device's local time

title: Delayed Start
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in delayed start
custom_expected: Then the user will see the delayed indicator underneath the game time

title: Warmup
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in Warmup
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Warmup text
AND see the away runs over the home runs
AND see the on base Indicator (no men on)
AND see the count (Balls - Strikes) and outs (set to 0)

title: Top Inning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in Top inning
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Inning text (Top 2nd)
AND see the away runs over the home runs
AND see the on base Indicator
AND see the count (Balls - Strikes) and outs

title: Mid Inning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in the Mid inning
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Inning text (Mid 3rd)
AND see the away runs over the home runs
AND will not see the on base Indicator
AND see the count (Balls - Strikes) and outs

title: Bottom Inning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in Bottom inning
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Inning text (Bot 2nd)
AND see the away runs over the home runs
AND see the on base Indicator
AND see the count (Balls - Strikes) and outs

title: End Inning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in End inning
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Inning text (End 2nd)
AND see the away runs over the home runs
AND will not see the on base Indicator
AND see the count (Balls - Strikes) and outs

title: In-Game Delay
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in an in-game delay
custom_expected: Then the user will see the delayed indicator underneath the inning status

title: Suspended - Day of Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in Suspended
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Inning text (Top 2nd)
AND see the away runs over the home runs
AND see the on base Indicator
AND see the count (Balls - Strikes) and outs
AND see the Suspended indicator (Susp)
AND see the resume TBD or date in the expanded tray

title: Suspended - Resume Day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a resume date for a game in Suspended
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Inning text (Top 2nd)
AND see the away runs over the home runs
AND see the on base Indicator
AND see the count (Balls - Strikes) and outs
AND see the Suspended indicator (Susp)
AND see the probable pitchers in the expanded tray

GIVEN the app has been installed

custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in Postponed

GIVEN the app has been installed

custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in Canceled
custom_expected: Then the user will see the Canceled indicator instead of the time

custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in Forfeit

custom_expected:

GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game that is a no hitter

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see the Inning text (Top 7nd)
AND see the away runs over the home runs
AND see the on base Indicator

AND see the No Hitter indicator

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in final
custom_steps_separated.expected:

AND away team over home team
AND the No Hitter indicator

custom_steps_separated.expected:

AND see the away runs over the home runs
AND see the on base Indicator
AND see the count (Balls - Strikes) and outs

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in final
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see the final indicator
AND away team over home team
AND the Perfect Game indicator

custom_expected:

title: Single Season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND a single season is setup in the MAST tool Calendar Config
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the correct year/season setup on the Scoreboard

title: Two Season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND two seasons have been setup in the MAST tool Calendar Config
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the correct years/seasons setup on the Scoreboard

title: First Allowed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND a season start date is setup in the MAST tool Calendar Config
custom_steps:
WHEN a user navigates to the Scoreboard
AND navigates back on the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the user is unable to access any days before the first allowed date

title: Last Allowed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND a season end date is setup in the MAST tool Calendar Config
custom_steps:
WHEN a user navigates to the Scoreboard
AND navigates forward on the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the user is unable to access any days after the last allowed date

title: Flip Time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND a flip time is setup in the MAST tool Calendar Config
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the device time is setup before the flip time
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the previous day games

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the device time is setup after the flip time
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the next day games

title: Scoreboard Override
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND a scoreboard override is setup in the MAST tool Webview Config

For example: Homerun Derby Webview on the day before the All Star Game
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to Scoreboard
and to the date of that the override is setup
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a webview specified in the URL
AND the user is able to scroll to the previous/next day on the Scoreboard

title: Placement
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When there is a sponsorship ad set up in the config
and the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the sponsorship ad in a row between the MLB logo and the date bar
and the ad will remain consistent if the users views different dates on the Scoreboard

title: Configurable Dates
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When there is a sponsorship ad set up in the config for a specific date
and the device is set to that specific date
and the user navs to the Scoreboard

(see the "date" value in the config - https://storage.mobile.mlbinfra.com/atbatconfig/sponsorship.json)
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the specific sponsorship ad on top of the Scoreboard
and the ad will remain the same if the user views different dates on the Scoreboard

title: Lite User
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is a Lite user
custom_steps:
When there is a sponsorship ad set up in the config
and the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: Then the Lite user will see the sponsorship ad on top of the Scoreboard

title: Paid User
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with a paid account
custom_steps:
When there is a sponsorship ad set up in the config
and "disableForPaidUsers" is set to "false" in the config
https://storage.mobileqa.mlbinfra.com/atbatconfig/sponsorship.json
and the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: Then the paid user will see the sponsorship ad on top of the Scoreboard

title: Kill Switch Config for Paid Users
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB App is installed
and the user is logged in with a paid account
custom_steps:
When "disableForPaidUsers" is set to "true" in the config
https://storage.mobileqa.mlbinfra.com/atbatconfig/sponsorship.json
and the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: Then the paid user will not see the sponsorship ad on top of the Scoreboard

title: Light Mode
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed on an iOS 13.x device
and the app is in Light Mode
custom_steps:
When there is a sponsorship ad set up in the config
and the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the proper sponsorship ad on top of the Scoreboard
and it will be specific to Light Mode (based off the Light Mode image in the config)

title: Dark Mode
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed on an iOS 13.x device
and the app is in Dark Mode
custom_steps:
When there is a sponsorship ad set up in the config
and the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the proper sponsorship ad on top of the Scoreboard
and it will be specific to Dark Mode (based off the Dark Mode image in the config)

title: Spanish
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the device language is set to Spanish
custom_steps:
When there is a sponsorship ad set up in the config
and the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the proper sponsorship ad on top of the Scoreboard
and it will be specific to Spanish (based off the Spanish image in the config)

title: Swipe
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user swipes the scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the user can navigate between days

title: > 15 Games
custom_preconds: GIVEN the app has been installed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Scoreboard
AND there are more than 15 games
custom_expected:
THEN then the maximum of 15 games will be displayed on the Scoreboard
AND the user is able to scroll to see the additional game(s)

title: User taps on the date header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app is installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps on the date in the top of the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the Calendar Picker appears

title: Number of games on Calendar matches number of games in Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the Date at the top of the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN the Calendar picker will appear
AND the number of games listed on each date in the calendar should match the number of games scheduled for that date.

title: User taps on a date in the Calendar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND has launched the calendar picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a date on the calendar picker
custom_expected:
THEN the calendar picker should disappear
AND the user should be taken back to the Scoresboard
AND the date that the user is left on should be the newly selected date

title: User taps on the 'Today' button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
AND the user is on a date that is different than today's date
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the Date in the top of the Scoreboard
AND the user taps the 'Today' button in the top of the calendar picker
custom_expected:
THEN the calendar picker should disappear
AND the user should be brought to the Scoreboard
AND the date the user is on should be 'Todays' date

title: User taps on the forward and back arrows in Calendar Picker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
And has launched the Calendar picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the left or right calendar arrows
custom_expected: THEN the calendar should adjust and show the newly selected month accordingly

title: User swipes left and right in Calendar Picker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
AND has launched the Calendar picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user swipes left and right on the calendar
custom_expected: THEN the calendar should flip to show the newly selected month

title: User scrolls the month scroll bar at the bottom of Calendar Picker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user has navigated to the Scoresboard
AND has launched the calendar picker
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls left and right along the bottom scroll bar
custom_expected: THEN the month selected should quickly adjust as the user slides back and forth

title: Flip Time - Before 10am
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed

custom_steps: WHEN the user has navigates to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the previous day default on the Scoreboard

custom_steps: WHEN the user has navigates to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the current day default on the Scoreboard

title: Probable Pitchers

THEN the user will see the team tricode, name, and stats (W-L, ERA) for the appropriate team
AND team tricode and TBD for the other team

custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in progress that is in team challenge
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Inning text (Top 2nd)
AND see the <Team> Chal indicator after the inning
AND see the away runs over the home runs
AND see the on base Indicator
AND see the count (Balls - Strikes) and outs

title: Umpire Review
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in progress that is in umpire review
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Inning text (Top 2nd)
AND see the Ump Review Indicator (Ump Rev) after the inning
AND see the away runs over the home runs
AND see the on base Indicator
AND see the count (Balls - Strikes) and outs

title: No Hitter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game that is a no hitter

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see the Inning text (Top 7nd)
AND see the away runs over the home runs
AND see the on base Indicator
AND see the count (Balls - Strikes) and outs
AND see the No Hitter indicator

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in final
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see the final indicator
AND away team over home team
AND the No Hitter indicator

title: Perfect Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game that is a perfect game

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected:
AND the game is in progress
THEN the user will see the Inning text (Top 7nd)
AND see the away runs over the home runs
AND see the on base Indicator
AND see the count (Balls - Strikes) and outs
AND see the Perfect Game indicator

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the game is in final
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see the final indicator
AND away team over home team
AND the Perfect Game indicator

title: Final
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user views game details for a game in Final
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Final text 
AND see the away team logo, name, record, score over the home away team logo, name, record, score

title: Final - Extra Innings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views game details for a game in Final
AND ended in extra innings
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Final text and innings (Final/11)
AND see the away team logo, name, record, score over the home away team logo, name, record, score

title: Final - Completed Early
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is on the Scoreboard
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views game details for a game in Final
AND ended early
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the Final text and innings (Final/6)
AND see the away team logo, name, record, score over the home away team logo, name, record, score

title: Single Season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND a single season is setup in the MAST tool Calendar Config
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the correct year/season setup on the Scoreboard

title: Two Season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND a two seasons have been setup in the MAST tool Calendar Config
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the correct years/seasons setup on the Scoreboard

title: First Allowed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND a season start date is setup in the MAST tool Calendar Config
custom_steps:
WHEN a user navigates to the Scoreboard
AND navigates back on the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the user is unable to access any days before the first allowed date

title: Last Allowed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND a season end date is setup in the MAST tool Calendar Config
custom_steps:
WHEN a user navigates to the Scoreboard
AND navigates forward on the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the user is unable to access any days after the last allowed date

title: Flip Time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND a flip time is setup in the MAST tool Calendar Config
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to the Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the device time is setup before the flip time
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the previous day games

custom_steps_separated.content: AND the device time is setup after the flip time
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the next day games

title: Scoreboard Override
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND a scoreboard override is setup in the MAST tool Webview Config

For example: Homerun Derby Webview on the day before the All Star Game
custom_steps:
When a user navigates to Scoreboard
and to the date of that the override is setup
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a webview specified in the URL
AND the user is able to scroll to the previous/next day on the Scoreboard

title: Placement
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When there is a sponsorship ad set up in the config
and the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the sponsorship ad in a row between the MLB logo and the date bar
and the ad will remain consistent if the users views different dates on the Scoreboard

title: Configurable Dates
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When there is a sponsorship ad set up in the config for a specific date
and the device is set to that specific date
and the user navs to the Scoreboard

(see the "date" value in the config - https://storage.mobile.mlbinfra.com/atbatconfig/sponsorship.json)
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the specific sponsorship ad on top of the Scoreboard
and the ad will remain the same if the user views different dates on the Scoreboard

title: Lite User
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is a Lite user
custom_steps:
When there is a sponsorship ad set up in the config
and the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: Then the Lite user will see the sponsorship ad on top of the Scoreboard

title: Paid User
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with a paid account
custom_steps:
When there is a sponsorship ad set up in the config
and "disableForPaidUsers" is set to "false" in the config
https://storage.mobileqa.mlbinfra.com/atbatconfig/sponsorship.json
and the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: Then the paid user will see the sponsorship ad on top of the Scoreboard

title: Kill Switch Config for Paid Users
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB App is installed
and the user is logged in with a paid account
custom_steps:
When "disableForPaidUsers" is set to "true" in the config
https://storage.mobileqa.mlbinfra.com/atbatconfig/sponsorship.json
and the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: Then the paid user will not see the sponsorship ad on top of the Scoreboard

title: Light Mode
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed on an iOS 13.x device
and the app is in Light Mode
custom_steps:
When there is a sponsorship ad set up in the config
and the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the proper sponsorship ad on top of the Scoreboard
and it will be specific to Light Mode (based off the Light Mode image in the config)

title: Dark Mode
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed on an iOS 13.x device
and the app is in Dark Mode
custom_steps:
When there is a sponsorship ad set up in the config
and the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the proper sponsorship ad on top of the Scoreboard
and it will be specific to Dark Mode (based off the Dark Mode image in the config)

title: Spanish
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the device language is set to Spanish
custom_steps:
When there is a sponsorship ad set up in the config
and the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the proper sponsorship ad on top of the Scoreboard
and it will be specific to Spanish (based off the Spanish image in the config)

title: Refresh after foregrounding the app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the backgrounds the app on Scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user foregrounds the app
custom_expected:
THEN the Scoreboard will update immediately
AND the game cells will update

title: Foreground after long background on another date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user navigates to another date on the Scoreboard
AND the user backgrounds the app for longer than an hour
custom_steps: WHEN the user foregrounds the app
custom_expected: THEN the Scoreboard will be set to Today's Date

title: Returns to Scoreboard after viewing MLB.TV
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND has navigated to Scoreboard
AND started an MLB.TV feed
AND the user has been viewing MLB.TV for multiple innings
custom_steps:
WHEN a user exits the MLB.TV feed
AND then returns to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the Scoreboard should refresh to show the current data

title: Returns to Scoreboard after viewing Gameday
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND has navigated to Scoreboard
AND started viewing Gameday
AND the user has been viewing Gameday for multiple innings
custom_steps:
When the user exits Gameday
and returns back to the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the Scoreboard should refresh to show the current data
